snippet.title: Ghost Recon Breakpoint: E3 2019 We are Brothers Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-order Ghost Recon Breakpoint now to get access to the Beta and receive the Sentinel Corp. Pack ! 
https://ubi.li/yaESU

Register now for a chance to play the Beta on the 5th September :
http://ghostrecon.com/beta

Injured and hunted down by the Wolves, ex-Ghosts gone rogue, you must fight back to survive. They are perfect predators, but you have the skills to even the odds. With your brothers and sisters at your side, there is no fight you fear.

We are Ghosts. We aren’t afraid of death.
https://ghostrecon.com
